testCases.label: Verify registration form submission flow
testCases.description: Fills out the registration form fields (name, email, password, gender, birthdate, terms checkbox), submits the form, and verifies that the success message 'Registration successful!' is displayed.

testCases.label: Verify login form authentication flow
testCases.description: Enters login credentials, submits the login form, checks that the success message 'Login successful!' appears, and asserts that the logged-in user name element displays 'John Doe'.

testCases.label: Verify feedback form submission and button state
testCases.description: Submits feedback with a comment and rating, verifies the success message 'Feedback submitted!', and then confirms that the 'Submit Feedback' button is disabled after submission.

testCases.label: Verify registration form validation messages
testCases.description: Attempts to submit the registration form with missing or invalid values (empty name, invalid email format, empty password) and asserts that each field shows a non-empty HTML validationMessage.

testCases.label: Verify gender select dropdown behavior
testCases.description: Checks the default selected gender option is 'Male', then changes the selection to 'Female' and 'Other' respectively, verifying that the dropdown reflects each selected value.
